name: @fusionauth/typescript-client
description: A typescript implementation of the FusionAuth client.

scripts.test: npx mocha build/test/*.js && npx karma start
scripts.build-browser: mkdir -p dist && npx browserify index.ts --standalone FusionAuth --debug -p [ tsify --target=es5 ] -t browserify-shim -o dist/fusionauth-typescript-client.js
scripts.build-browser-min: mkdir -p dist && npx browserify index.ts --standalone FusionAuth --debug -p [ tsify --target=es5 ] -t browserify-shim -t uglifyify | npx uglifyjs --source-map base -o dist/fusionauth-typescript-client.min.js
scripts.pretest: npx tsc && npx tsc -p test && mkdir -p dist && npx browserify test/*.ts --debug -t envify -p [ tsify --target=es5 -p test ] -t browserify-shim -t uglifyify | npx uglifyjs --source-map base -o dist/fusionauth-typescript-client-test.min.js
scripts.prepare: npx tsc && npm run build-browser && npm run build-browser-min

author: Tyler Scott
